name: Kaiju Goo Goo
description:
Destroy the opposing city (they're not nice people).

Send out you Goo monsters. Monsters of the same type merge to together. When they reach a certain size they mutate. Combining with other goo, including the enemy, to form a Kaiju .

Press 1, 2 or 3 to send a Goo monster.

WARNING: there is a game breaking bug, that sometimes causes the game to lock up.
